string.text: Clean Deal - Meet the Stalkers
Got a voice message from Senya Snap - says there's a way to "make some serious cash." They're waiting for me at the Cordon, near the tunnel to Darkscape.
Clean Deal - Reach the deal point

There's gonna be a deal at night in Darkscape near the ruined railroad bridge - some "downed" guys will be trading various gear for money and artefacts - we need it more. But first we gotta reach the deal point.
Damn, an ambush! Gotta deal with these mercs - no time to stare at the PDA!
Mercs are done for - time to collect the loot - containers should be right under the bridge. After that, I should talk about splitting the loot with Senya Snap.
No one leaves here alive - gotta waste Senya, Danila and Denis so no one finds out what happened here. All this loot belongs to me! And only me!
Clean Deal - Neutralize the mercenaries
Clean Deal - Find and collect the containers
Clean Deal - Talk to Senya Snap
Clean Deal - Eliminate unnecessary witnesses

Alright, glad ya came - everyone's here: Danila, Senya, and Denis Toothless. So, here's the deal: we got a fat chance to score some serious loot, no bullshit, prolly 50k worth of gear for each of us, like really. In Darkscape, some downed bastards are settin' up a deal at night - trading artefacts for guns and gear, plus a fat stack of rubles on top - four containers total, just right for each of us. Senya kinda... let's say he "accidentally" intercepted one of 'em, and from his PDA, there should be eight guys. Well, seven, if ya count the stiff. Should be easy, four of us can waste those freeloaders no problem. So, ya in or out? No time to think - yes or no.
I'm in, guys.

Fuck yeah. Alright, here's a radio so we can talk, now listen up - we'll wait till night in the tunnel, then hoof it to the ruined bridge in Darkscape. Long fuckin' walk, but luckily there's a stalker group at the sawmill - we can stop by if we need supplies. Once we hit the bridge, we waste those pricks, split the loot, and scatter. Oh, and one more thing - signal's shit in Darkscape, only works on high ground, and none of us got a "Signal Booster", so memorize the map while ya can. Anyway, if there's more to say, I'll tell ya on the way.
Got it - let's move, damn it.
Guys, I'm swamped right now, can't roll with ya.

Fu-u-u-u-u-u-ck me sideways! Goddamn backstabbin' piece of... Ah, screw ya then. Get the hell outta here, we'll handle it without ya and make bank like crazy, while you go scavenge scraps like a damn dog.
Fine, I'm out. Later.
Alright boys, the stalker's with us - extra firepower never hurts. Senya, what's the word on the PDA guy?
Nothin' new, but got a message askin' where the stiff is. These guys are foreign I think, speakin' English. We gotta move our asses before these fuckers leave the Darkscape.
Relax, they ain't gettin' far from Darkscape - either run into the Sultan guys or straight into us. Whatever, let's haul ass to the tunnel and wait for nightfall.
Night's finally here... God I hate Darkscape, fucking shithole.
Perfect for your ugly ass. Just hope we don't run into any freaky shit...
No shit... Stalker - lead the way! We'll follo... Blyat... Hui.
Hey, stalker, the communication is good from here. Try pullin' up your PDA, check it. If there is a communication, check the map.
There's a stalker camp at the sawmill, let's not make too much noise - they're chill, but we don't need any extra trouble right now.
I'm already stocked up. But you stalker, might wanna grab some supplies if you need 'em - nothing but shitstorm ahead.
Bridge ain't far now, time to kill the lights. Stay sharp and keep your eyes peeled.
God is with us...
Remember - no English.
Alpha Actual to Alpha One Four - John, where the heck are you? You fucking late! The deal is already under way! I see your PDA is active - why you not answering!?
The fuck they yappin' about?
Deal's started, we gotta move our asses double-time, or we'll be chasing these fucks all over Darkscape.
That's it, we wasted 'em all. Stalker, go find the containers then get your ass back here - time to split the loot.
Fuck me, last time we had a shootout like this was five years back.
Yeah, not like roughing up those rookies back in Cordon.
Bravo Actual, this is Alpha Actual - SITREP, over.
Alpha Actual, this is Bravo Actual - crossing Zone Perimeter, entering AO, all Green, ETA 5 Mikes, how copy, over.
Roger that Bravo, Break.
Bravo, be advised - we have one MIA in Cordon area, proceed with caution, over
Copy that, Bravo out.
Well fuck you then, backstabber - no matter, we'll manage without you - more loot for us anyway.

Fuck me... Damn thing glitched! Testing, testing... Sound working? Whatever. Well... Stalker, hey there, it's Senya Snap, remember me? You delivered that package to me from Danila Extremist. Don't recall? Fuck it anyway. Listen up, got a chance to make some serious cash, I mean real fucking bank - you in? We'll be waiting at Cordon, near the tunele... Fuck, tunnel to Darkscape - get your ass here quick, we ain't waiting forever! And uh, bring a flashlight or NVGs if you're rolling in cash - we will work during night.
Flash! Alpha, we have four unknown PDA signals approaching our position from Cordon area, the deal is compromised, prepare for contact!
Roger that Alpha! All Bravo units prepare for combat!
Light them up boys!
Ambush! Let's fuck them up!
Sniper on the bridge - keep your heads down!
Suka! These bastards got top-tier gear and training - they're tearing us a new one!
This is for John, motherfuckers!
Bravo, be advised, visual on four unknown armed men, over!
Very funny Alpha, regroup under the bridge, all Green.
Alright, got all the containers. So how we splitting this?
Well stalker, here's the thing...
The fuck you mean "the thing"?
You fucking snakes! Knew this was a setup from the start! You're dead, you cocksuckers! \n%c[d_orange][Attack]

The artifact container's mine, no discussion - I need 'em, and not for cash... Though if they don't work out, I'll pawn 'em off. The money goes to Denis, he wants top-notch gear. The rest we can split - see, I knew what's in these from the PDA all along, so here's your choice: 

This one's got a sniper rifle, M24 chambered in .338 Lapua Magnum, one of the best in its class, I'd kill to have one myself. 

That container's got gear - a sweet "Nomad" suit and three kevlar plates to stop bullets without breaking a sweat. 

So what'll it be?
I'll take the "Nomad" and kevlar plates.
Gimme the sniper rifle, could use one.
Fuck your deal - easier to waste you and take it all! \n%c[d_orange][Attack]
Smart choice! Alright stalker, we better haul ass before more come for the gunfire... We'll go our way, you go yours. Later, and... thanks for the help.
See ya!
I should talk to Senya Snap first.
